scripts.release: npm run build && npm run deploy && np --no-cleanup --yolo --no-release-draft
scripts._release: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy: git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin master
scripts.deploy2: git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix examples master`:gh-pages --force
scripts.deploy_test: git add -A && git commit -m 'deploy' && git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories && git push origin master
scripts._deploy: git add -f dist && git commit -m 'deploy' && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix dist master`:gh-pages --force && git rm -r dist && git commit -m 'cleanup deploy'
